Mingzhi Liu is a dedicated Ph.D. student specializing in Tumor Biology within the Wilhelm Group at the Department of Microbiology, Tumor, and Cell Biology. He obtained his Bachelor of Science degree in Biological Sciences from Southwest University, Chongqing, China, followed by completing his Master of Science degree in Biomedicine at Karolinska Institutet. Mingzhiâ€™s research project revolves around the intriguing field of modeling neuroblastoma using reprogrammed patient-derived stem cells.
